title: New: Julio Bashmore – Au Seve
body:
What happens when you don’t feel comfortable settling down on a record label and signing away all your creativity/dignity to them? Well you start your own label of course.

At least if you’re **Julio Bashmore** that is, who has just announced the launch of **Broadwalk Records**, with the first material being this rather lovely new track of his own titled _Au Seve_. It’s a club banger in waiting, and a surefire hit at this summers festivals if I ever heard one. Check it out below.
